Articles.Content: In orbit of Minmus and went on EVA.  Quick saved and went back to space center.  Upon returning to control the kerbal in EVA... the kerbal is now locked in orbit and cannot change position and does not travel on the path it shows in orbit.  In time warp in vessel view, the kerbal flies away.  When returning to 1x speed, the kerbal reappears.  In map view in 1x and time warp the kerbal does not travel along orbit.  Tried reloading and rebooting game--same issue.  I have the save file if any dev wants to troubleshoot or take a look.
Thread moved from KSP 2 Discussion to KSP 2 Bug Reports.
